content: Please provide an excel table containing a list of commonly used acronyms and their full forms. I need to know the expanded form of the acronym NASA.

Certainly! Below is an example of an Excel table with some commonly used acronyms and their full forms. For your specific request, the acronym "NASA" stands for "National Aeronautics and Space Administration."

| Acronym | Full Form                                     |
|---------|-----------------------------------------------|
| NASA    | National Aeronautics and Space Administration |
| WHO     | World Health Organization                     |
| UN      | United Nations                                |
| NATO    | North Atlantic Treaty Organization            |
| ASAP    | As Soon As Possible                           |
| DIY     | Do It Yourself                                |
| FAQ     | Frequently Asked Questions                    |
| FYI     | For Your Information                          |
| GDP     | Gross Domestic Product                        |
| HTML    | HyperText Markup Language                     |

You can use this format to create your own Excel table by entering the data into an Excel spreadsheet.
